document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 97-10
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 1.08 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, TO ADD A NEW SECTION 1.08.030, ADOPTING "GATEWAY TO THE NAPA VALLEY" AS THE OFFICIAL SLOGAN FOR THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON
